submitted_answers.student-parsons-solution:
it 'fails with negative balance' do
  expect { GiftCard.new(-1) }.to raise_error(ZeroDivisionError)
end

  expect { GiftCard.new(-1) }.to raise_error(ZeroDivisionError)
